name: @just-every/code-bridge
description: Development-only bridge for capturing errors and logs in web, Node, and React Native

scripts.sdk:python: sh -c 'node tools/protocol-test-server.js --port=9877 --secret=dev-secret >/tmp/cb-server.log 2>&1 & pid=$!; CODE_BRIDGE_URL=ws://localhost:9877 CODE_BRIDGE_SECRET=dev-secret pip install -r python/requirements.txt >/dev/null && CODE_BRIDGE_URL=ws://localhost:9877 CODE_BRIDGE_SECRET=dev-secret pytest python/tests; status=$?; kill $pid || true; exit $status'
scripts.sdk:go: sh -c 'node tools/protocol-test-server.js --port=9877 --secret=dev-secret >/tmp/cb-server.log 2>&1 & pid=$!; CODE_BRIDGE_URL=ws://localhost:9877 CODE_BRIDGE_SECRET=dev-secret (cd go && go test ./...); status=$?; kill $pid || true; exit $status'
scripts.sdk:php: sh -c 'node tools/protocol-test-server.js --port=9877 --secret=dev-secret >/tmp/cb-server.log 2>&1 & pid=$!; cd php && composer install --no-interaction --no-progress && CODE_BRIDGE_URL=ws://localhost:9877 CODE_BRIDGE_SECRET=dev-secret php tests/smoke.php; status=$?; kill $pid || true; exit $status'
scripts.sdk:ruby: sh -c 'node tools/protocol-test-server.js --port=9877 --secret=dev-secret >/tmp/cb-server.log 2>&1 & pid=$!; cd ruby && bundle install --quiet && CODE_BRIDGE_URL=ws://localhost:9877 CODE_BRIDGE_SECRET=dev-secret ruby tests/smoke.rb; status=$?; kill $pid || true; exit $status'
scripts.sdk:rust: sh -c 'node tools/protocol-test-server.js --port=9877 --secret=dev-secret >/tmp/cb-server.log 2>&1 & pid=$!; cd rust && cargo test -- --nocapture; status=$?; kill $pid || true; exit $status'
scripts.sdk:swift: sh -c 'node tools/protocol-test-server.js --port=9877 --secret=dev-secret >/tmp/cb-server.log 2>&1 & pid=$!; cd swift && CODE_BRIDGE_URL=ws://localhost:9877 CODE_BRIDGE_SECRET=dev-secret swift test; status=$?; kill $pid || true; exit $status'
scripts.sdk:java: sh -c 'node tools/protocol-test-server.js --port=9877 --secret=dev-secret >/tmp/cb-server.log 2>&1 & pid=$!; cd java && mvn -q test; status=$?; kill $pid || true; exit $status'
